article.title: Raytheon's Next Generation Operational Control System Realigned
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Aurora, Colorado, is being awarded a $44.7 million cost-plus-incentive-fee and cost-plus-award-fee contract to realign the Next Generation Operation Control System technical baseline by adding effort associated with 20 requests for change against the specification and interface control documents.Â Space and Missile Systems Center, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
